title: Zoho Corp | MTS | Chennai
content:
**Education:** B.Tech in Information Technology
**Years of Experience:** 2.2 Years
**Date of the Offer:** November 28, 2023
**Company:** Zoho
**Title:** MTS
**Location:** Chennai
**Salary:** ₹8.4 LPA (Indian Rupees)
**Relocation/Signing Bonus:** N/A
**Stock bonus:** N/A
**Bonus:** ₹1.2 LPA
**Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock):** ₹9.6 LPA
**Other Benefits:** 
Joining kits, Macbook, IPhone.
Annual mobile and gift card allowances
Family floater insurance
Gym, free cab service available.
Team-building trips and treats
Generous leave policy (12 Casual, 12 Sick, 3 Optional Holidays)
Various allowances (Travel, Telephone, Internet, Car fuel)
Four daily free meals
24/7 free access to the pantry
Competitive yearly hikes (20% to 35%)

title: Oracle India | Bengaluru | Member Technical Staff
content:
Education: BTech in Computer Science - VNIT Nagpur
Years of Experience: 2 months intern experience at Oracle 
Date of the Offer: July 2022
Company: Oracle India
Title/Level: Member Technical Staff
Location: Bengaluru, India
Total CTC : Rs 64 L
Base Pay : 18LPA
Relocation: 30 days hotel reimbursement and whole travel was reimbursed.
Signing Bonus: 6 L
Stock bonus: 40 L (vested in 4 years)
Benefits:
Leave: 1 day per month
Vaction Leaves: 15 days in a year

title: Valuelabs | software Engineering specialist | Hyderabad
content:
Education:B.E(CSE) from NGIT(tier-3)
Years of Experience:0 years(fresher)
Date of the Offer:25-11-2022
Company:Valuelabs
Title/Level:software Engineering specialist
Location:Hyderabad
Salary:6,00,000 lpa
variable pay bonus:2,00,000 lpa
Total comp(CTC) :8,00,000 lpa
Benefits:free food,health insurance
Other details:it is a on campus offer, package is fixed for first three years(every year ctc will increase by 1 lakh) and there is bond period of two years ,if we break the bond we have to pay 2 lakhs for it.They given direct FTE for 2023 batch from dec 2022(8 months before graduation).
